github_commits.author: Rahul Sharma
github_commits.message: Initial architecture setup - S3 bucket creation & Lambda function design.
github_commits.lessons_learned: Learned that DynamoDB scaling needs careful consideration for peak loads. Also, need to explore cheaper S3 storage tiers.
github_commits.bug_related: This initial architecture sets the stage for optimizing storage costs through lifecycle policies.  Need to prioritize this during next sprint.
github_commits.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings

github_commits.author: Priya Sharma
github_commits.message: Added basic React component structure for UI.
github_commits.lessons_learned: React component structure is a good starting point, but needs further refinement for scalability.
github_commits.bug_related: The UI needs to be optimized for performance, which relates to overall cost efficiency.
github_commits.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings

slack_conversations.thread_title: Discussion about Initial architecture & Cost Savings

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Yaar, Initial architecture pe kaam karna hai!  S3 buckets banaya, Lambda function bhi design kiya hai.  Dekho kya hai?

messages.author: Priya
messages.text: Haan bhai, main dekh rahi hoon!  React components bhi ban rahi hoon.  Dekh, UI design ka kya hai?

messages.author: Amit
messages.text: Theek hai, let me check the code and see if everything is working as expected.  Dekho, DynamoDB mein problem hai, scaling ka kya hai?

messages.author: Neha
messages.text: Arrey, ye issue production mein aayega kya?  Cost bhi dekhna hai, kabhi kabhi!  Set lifecycle policy for cost savings...  yeh bhi dekhna hai.

messages.author: Rahul
messages.text: Nahi yaar, testing mein catch kar lenge.  Cost optimization is important, but first let's get the core functionality working.  Set lifecycle policy for cost savings - good idea!

slack_conversations.key_decisions: Decision to prioritize S3 bucket setup and Lambda function design.  Also discussed the importance of cost optimization through lifecycle policies.
slack_conversations.warnings: Warning:  Need to proactively address cost savings through S3 lifecycle policies.  Potential for overspending if not managed carefully.
slack_conversations.bug_clues: Discussion about DynamoDB scaling and the need to consider cost savings.  Subtle hint about the importance of S3 lifecycle policies.
slack_conversations.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings

jira_tickets.title: Implement Initial architecture - S3 & Lambda
jira_tickets.description: Develop the initial architecture, including S3 bucket creation, Lambda function design, and basic React component setup.  Focus on a scalable and cost-effective solution.  Start with a simple S3 lifecycle policy configuration.
comments: Update 1:  Initial setup complete.  Waiting for feedback.
jira_tickets.bug_connection: The initial architecture lays the foundation for future cost optimization efforts, specifically through the implementation of S3 lifecycle policies.
jira_tickets.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings

confluence_docs.title: Sprint 1: Initial Architecture - S3, Lambda & React
confluence_docs.content: Markdown content detailing the initial architecture design.  Includes S3 bucket configuration, Lambda function design, and basic React component structure.  Highlights the importance of scalability and cost optimization.  Initial focus: Setting up S3 lifecycle policies to automatically archive older data.
confluence_docs.author: Sneha Patel
best_practices: Use appropriate S3 storage classes based on data access patterns.
Regularly review and adjust S3 lifecycle policies.
common_mistakes: Not configuring S3 lifecycle policies, leading to unnecessary storage costs.
confluence_docs.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings

google_docs.title: Sprint 1 Planning & Cost Optimization Discussion
google_docs.content: Meeting notes from the Sprint 1 planning meeting.  Discussed the initial architecture, including S3, Lambda, and React.  Prioritized setting up S3 lifecycle policies for cost savings. Action items:  Rahul to research S3 lifecycle policy options. Priya to start working on React component structure. Amit to investigate DynamoDB scaling.
action_items: Rahul - Research S3 lifecycle policy options.
Priya - Begin React component structure design.
decisions_made: Decision to prioritize S3 lifecycle policy implementation.
Decision to start with a simple React component structure.
google_docs.bug_mentions: Reference to the potential for cost overruns if S3 lifecycle policies are not configured correctly.  Subtle reminder about cost savings.
google_docs.bug_stage: Set lifecycle policy for cost savings
